nodes.text: Semler Tevez was an employee of the Kanauer Corporation, operating in the Thrugii Asteroid Belt. Tevez's father, Jeoff Tevez, was the director of Kanauer's Thrugii mining operations. Tevez studied at the Imperial Academy and graduated with high honors. A talented pilot, Tevez used his family's wealth and influence to buy himself out of the military, joining Kanauer. Tevez was assigned to over the Thrugii work camps, and personally defended the company's interests when operations were threatened.
